thread.title: BRIEF-Pacific Biosciences Of California Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pacific Biosciences Of California Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-pacific biosciences of california announces proposed public offering of common stock feb
reuters) - pacific biosciences of california inc

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Pacific Biosciences Of California Inc :
* PACIFIC BIOSCIENCES OF CALIFORNIA, INC. ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK
* PACIFIC BIOSCIENCES OF CALIFORNIA INC - MAY USE PORTION OF NET PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO ACQUIRE OR INVEST IN COMPLEMENTARY BUSINESSES, OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
